text: Mark off the width and height of the picture. Add guidelines for Itachi’s body. Draw his head. Add a line, which will act as the center of his head.
Add guidelines for Itachi’s arms, legs and facial features.
Outline the shapes of the sleeves, legs, hair, headband and eyes of the character.
Outline the shape of Itachi’s hands, collar and shoes. Add more lines to his eyes and headband.
Add Uchiha’s sword, locks and toes. Detail the shapes for the feet and clothes.
Work on the whole figure, paying special attention to detail.
Contour Itachi Uchiha, trying to vary the thickness and darkness of the line. Add more detail and add the ground. Erase all guidelines.
